name: Joined Together (micz)
description:
It is a game created for GMTK 2021 Game Jam. The theme was Joined Together.

It took about 24 hours to create this prototype.

You are a random man who by coincidence was a target of a black magic spell and your soul was separated from your body. Now your soul wonders in a mysterious world and your body just copies its movements. You need to find a way to rejoin with your body.

The game has 7 levels that present core mechanics.  There is also a level editor. It allows to create custom maps. All maps were created using this editor.
Saved maps are stored here:
\AppData\LocalLow\Breams\JoinedTogether

I hope you will like it :) Enjoy!
